plugins.name: jaan-to
plugins.description: AI-powered plugin with 18 skills for product management, development, UX research, QA testing, and data analytics. Generate PRDs, user stories, task breakdowns, test cases, GTM tracking, and more. Features: two-phase workflow with human approval, quality-reviewer agent, context-scout agent, LEARN.md continuous improvement system.
